XII.ii.3.C.2.d
.
Advising Claimants to File a Claim With SSA
If a REPS claimant is not receiving SSA benefits, but there appears to be possible entitlement under the SSA program, advise the claimant to file a claim with SSA.
title: M21-1, Part XII, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section C - St. Louis Regional Office (RO) Actions on Claims for Benefits Under the Restored Entitlement Program for Survivors (REPS)
citation: Part XII, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section C
